name: Puzzle Block Fill Color
description:
Puzzle Block Fill Color is a challenging block puzzle game with a simple gameplay. With this simple and addictive block puzzle mania, challenge yourself and compete with your friends, colleagues and the family.
HOW TO PLAY
1. Simply drag the blocks to move them.
2. Try to create full lines on the grid vertically or horizontally.
3. Blocks can't be rotated.
4. No time limits.
